Text: After School Club, often shortened to ASC, is a South Korean internet-based live-music request television talk show co-hosted by Kevin Woo, Park Jimin, and Jae.

Text: After School Club:  K-pop idols Jang Han-byul and Eric Nam were the original main hosts of the show, and departed in January 2014 and April 2016, respectively.
